official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for the use, without charge, by qualified nonprofit organizations of available post office space open to the public for soliciting voter registration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to provide post office space, which is open to the public, to qualified nonprofit organizations for soliciting voter registration, to the extent that such activity does not interfere with Postal Service functions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for the use, without charge, by qualified nonprofit organizations of available post office space open to the public for soliciting voter registration, and for other purposes.
